verses.verse: Wherefore <WG3606>, holy<WG40> brethren<WG80>, partakers<WG3353> of a heavenly<WG2032> calling<WG2821>, consider<WG2657> the Apostle<WG652> and<WG2532> High Priest<WG749> of<WG3671> our<WG2257> confession<WG3671>, even Jesus<WG2424>;
who was<WG5607> faithful<WG4103> to him that appointed<WG4160> him<WG846>, as<WG5613> also<WG2532> was Moses<WG3475> in<WG1722> all<WG3650> his<WG846> house<WG3624>.

For <WG1063> he<WG3778> hath been counted worthy<WG515> of<WG1391> more<WG4119> glory<WG1391> than<WG3844> Moses<WG3475>, by<WG2596> so much as<WG3745> he that built<WG2680> the house<WG846> hath<WG2192> more<WG4119> honor<WG5092> than the house<WG3624>.
For <WG1063> every<WG3956> house<WG3624> is builded<WG2680> by<WG5259> some<WG5100> one<WG1161>; but he that built<WG2680> all things<WG3956> is God<WG2316>.

And <WG2532> Moses<WG3475> indeed<WG3303> was faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> all<WG3650> his<WG846> house<WG3624> as<WG5613> a servant<WG2324>, for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> of those things which were afterward to be spoken<WG2980>;

but <WG1161> Christ<WG5547> as<WG5613> a son<WG5207>, over<WG1909> his<WG846> house<WG3624>; whose<WG3739> house<WG3624> are we<WG2070>, if<WG1437> we<WG2249> hold fast<WG2722> our boldness<WG3954> and<WG2532> the glorying<WG2745> of our hope<WG1680> firm<WG949> unto<WG3360> the end<WG5056>.
Wherefore <WG1352>, even as<WG2531> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> saith<WG3004>, To-day<WG4594> if<WG1437> ye shall hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice<WG5456>,
Harden <WG4645> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>, as<WG5613> in<WG1722> the provocation<WG3894>, Like as in<WG2596> the day<WG2250> of the trial<WG3986> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>,
Where <WG3757> your<WG5216> fathers<WG3962> tried<WG3985> me<WG3165> by proving<WG1381> me<WG3165>, And<WG2532> saw<WG1492> my<WG3450> works<WG2041> forty<WG5062> years<WG2094>.

Wherefore <WG1352> I was displeased<WG4360> with this<WG1565> generation<WG1074>, And<WG2532> said<WG2036>, They do<WG4105> always<WG104> err<WG4105> in<WG2588> their heart<WG2588>: But<WG1161> they<WG846> did<WG1097> not<WG3756> know<WG1097> my<WG3450> ways<WG3598>;
As <WG5613> I sware<WG3660> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> wrath<WG3709>, They shall<WG1525> not<WG1487> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest<WG2663>.

Take heed<WG991>, brethren<WG80>, lest<WG3379> haply there shall be<WG2071> in<WG1722> any<WG5100> one of you<WG5216> an<WG2588> evil<WG4190> heart<WG2588> of unbelief<WG570>, in<WG1722> falling away<WG868> from<WG575> the living<WG2198> God<WG2316>:

but <WG235> exhort<WG3870> one another1438, 1538 day<WG2596> by day<WG2250>, so<WG891> long<WG3739> as it is called<WG2564> To-day<WG4594>; lest<WG3363> any<WG5100> one of<WG1537> you<WG5216> be hardened<WG4645> by the deceitfulness<WG539> of sin<WG266>:
for <WG1063> we are become<WG1096> partakers<WG3353> of Christ<WG5547>, if<WG1437> we hold<WG2722> fast the beginning<WG746> of our confidence<WG5287> firm<WG949> unto<WG3360> the end<WG5056>:

while <WG1722> it is said<WG3004>, To-day<WG4594> if<WG1437> ye shall hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice<WG5456>, Harden<WG4645> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>, as<WG5613> in<WG1722> the provocation<WG3894>.
For <WG1063> who<WG5100>, when they heard<WG191>, did provoke<WG3893>? nay<WG235>, did not<WG3756> all<WG3956> they that came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> Egypt<WG125> by<WG1223> Moses<WG3475>?

And <WG1161> with whom<WG5101> was he displeased<WG4360> forty<WG5062> years<WG2094>? was it not<WG3780> with them that sinned<WG264>, whose<WG3739> bodies<WG2966> fell<WG4098> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>?
And <WG1161> to whom<WG5101> sware he<WG3660> that<WG3361> they should<WG1525> not<WG3361> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest<WG2663>, but1487, 3361 to them that were disobedient<WG544>?
And <WG2532> we see<WG991> that<WG3754> they were<WG1410> not<WG3756> able to enter in<WG1525> because of<WG1223> unbelief<WG570>.
